Operation 'post-getNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description is too vague and lacks specificity about inputs and outputs. Added clarity about what configuration details are returned, the required input parameter, and the response schema type to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.current_description: Returns the details of the configuration of a notification subscription.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete configuration details of a specific notification subscription, including event types, endpoint URL, and status. Requires the notification configuration ID as input. Returns a NotificationConfigurationDetails object containing all subscription parameters.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague and lacks specificity about inputs and outputs. Added clarity about what configuration details are returned, the required input parameter, and the response schema type to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'post-getNotificationConfigurationList' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Description lacks clarity about the return format and structure. Added specificity about the list response format and what each configuration object contains to help AI agents understand the response structure.

data.current_summary: Get a list of notification subscription configurations
data.current_description: Returns the details of the configurations of all of the notification subscriptions in the platform of the executing user.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves all notification subscription configurations for the executing user's platform. Returns a list of NotificationConfigurationDetails objects, each containing the complete configuration for an active subscription including event types, endpoint URLs, and status.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about the return format and structure. Added specificity about the list response format and what each configuration object contains to help AI agents understand the response structure.

message: Operation 'post-testNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description lacks clarity about required inputs and response format. Added specificity about the configuration ID requirement, event type selection, and the response schema to improve AI agent understanding of what this operation requires and returns.

data.current_description: Tests an existing notification subscription configuration. For each event type specified, a test notification will be generated and sent to the URL configured in the subscription specified.
data.description_suggestion: Tests an existing notification subscription configuration by sending test notifications for specified event types to the configured endpoint. Requires the notification configuration ID and event types to test. Returns a TestNotificationConfigurationResponse containing the test results and delivery status for each event type.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about required inputs and response format. Added specificity about the configuration ID requirement, event type selection, and the response schema to improve AI agent understanding of what this operation requires and returns.

message: Operation 'post-updateNotificationConfiguration' has semantic quality issues: missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Description lacks clarity about required inputs and response format. Added specificity about the configuration ID requirement, clarified the event type replacement behavior, and specified the response schema to improve AI agent interpretability of inputs and outputs.

data.current_description: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration. If you are updating the event types, you must provide all event types, otherwise the previous event type configuration will be overwritten.
data.description_suggestion: Updates an existing notification subscription configuration with new settings. Requires the configuration ID and updated parameters. When modifying event types, all desired event types must be provided as partial updates will replace the entire event type configuration. Returns the updated NotificationConfigurationDetails object.
data.reasoning: Description lacks clarity about required inputs and response format. Added specificity about the configuration ID requirement, clarified the event type replacement behavior, and specified the response schema to improve AI agent interpretability of inputs and outputs.
